publisher.publisher-name: Graduate Faculty of Political and Social Science, New School for Social Research

title-group.article-title: Types of Social Science in the Light of Human Interests of Knowledge

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 1977 New School for Social Research

p.mixed-citation: Jürgen Habermas, Erkenntnis und Interesse (Frankfurt: Suhrkamp, 1968), Eng. trans. Knowledge and Human Interests (Boston: Beacon Press, 1971).
K. O. Apel and others, Hermeneutik und Ideologiekritik [Frankfurt: Suhrkamp, 1971]
K. O. Apel, Transformation der Philosophie , 2 vols. [Frankfurt: Suhrkamp, 1973]).
K. O. Apel, "Communication and the Foundation of the Humanities," Acta Sociologica 15 (1972): 7-26 (expanded version in Man and World 5 [1972]: 3-37).
Jürgen Habermas, "Nachwort," in his Erkenntnis und Interesse, 2nd ed. (Frankfurt: Suhrkamp, 1973),
Winfried Dallmayr, ed., Materialien zu Habermas' Erkenntnis und Interesse (Frankfurt: Suhrkamp, 1974).

K. O. Apel, "Programmatische Bemerkungen zur Idee einer 'transzendentalen Sprachpragmatik,' " in Timo Airaksinen and others, eds., Studia Philosophica in Hon- orem Sven Krohn (Turku: Annales Universitatis, 1973), pp. 11-36
Carl H. Heidrich, ed., Semantics and Communication [Amsterdam and London: North-Holland, 1974], pp. 81-108
K. O. Apel, "Sprechakttheorie und transzendentale Sprachpragmatik zur Frage ethischer Normen," in K. O. Apel, ed., Sprachpragmatik und Philosophie (Frankfurt: Suhrkamp, 1975).
Apel, Transformation der Philosophie, esp. vol. 2.
Michael Scriven, "Explanation and Prediction in Evolutionary Theory," Science 130 (1959): 477-482;
Wesley C. Salmon, "Statistical Explanation," in Wesley C. Salmon, ed., Statistical Explanation and Statistical Relevance (Pittsburgh: University of Pittsburgh Press, 1971), pp. 26-87.
Martin Heidegger, "Die Zeit des Weltbildes," in his Holzwege (Frankfurt: Klostermann, 1950), pp. 69-104.
Carl G. Hempel, "The Function of General Laws in History," The Journal of Philosophy 39 (1942)
C. G. Hempel and P. Oppenheim, "Studies in the Logic of Explanation," in Carl G. Hempel, Aspects of Scientific Explanation (New York: Free Press, 1965).
Theodor Abel, "The Operation Called Verstehen" in Herbert Feigl and May Brodbeck, eds., Readings in the Philosophy of Science (New York: Appleton-Century- Crofts, 1953).
Jürgen Habermas, "Wahrheitstheorien," in Helmut Fahrenbach, ed., Wirklichkeit und Reflexion: Walter Schulz z. 60 Geburtstag (Pfullingen: Neske, 1973);

Jürgen Habermas, "Vorbereitende Bemerkungen zu einer Theorie der Kom- munikativen Kompetenz," in Jürgen Habermas and Niklas Luhmann, Theorie der Gesellschaft oder Sozialtechnologie (Frankfurt: Suhrkamp, 1971).
Hans-Georg Gadamer, Wahrheit und Methode (Tübingen: Mohr, 1960), pp. 162 ff.
Hans Albert, "Hermeneutik and Realwissenschaft," in his Plädoyer für kritischen Rationalismus (Munich: Piper, 1971), pp. 106-149,
Hans Albert, Transzendentale Träumereien (Hamburg: Hoffman & Campe, 1975), pp. 46 ff.

K. O. Apel, "Noam Chomskys Sprachtheorie und die Philosophie der Gegenwart," Jahrbuch des Instituts für Deutsche Sprache (Mannheim, 1972), reprinted in Apel, Transformation der Philosophie, 2: 264-310.
Jürgen Habermas, "Was heisst Universalpragmatik?" in Apel, Sprachprag- matik und Philosophie.
Karl R. Popper, The Poverty of Historicism, 2nd ed. (London: Routledge & Kegan Paul, 1960), "Preface."
(Popper, The Poverty of Historicism, pp. 25-26).
Robert K. Merton, in his famous discussion of self-fulfilling prophecy in his Social Theory and Social Structure, rev. ed. (New York: Free Press, 1957), pp. 421-436,
Paul Lorenzen and Oswald Schwemmer, Konstruktive Logik, Ethik und Wis- senschaftstheorie (Mannheim: B.I. -Wissenschaftsverlag, 1973),
Otfried Hoffe, Strategien der Humanität: Zur Ethik öffentlicher Entscheidungsprozesse (Freiburg and Munich: Alber, 1975).
William Dray, Laws and Explanation in History (London: Oxford University Press, 1957).
G. H. von Wright, Explanation and Understanding (Ithaca: Cornell University Press, 1971).
K. O. Apel, "Causal Explanation, Motivational Explanation, and Hermeneutic Understanding," Ajatus 37 (1977).
ibid.
I. Lakatos, "History of Science and Its Rational Reconstructions," Boston Studies in the Philosophy of Science 8 (1971): 91-136.

J. R. Searle's metacritique of the critique of the "naturalistic fallacy" in K. O. Apel, "Sprechakttheorie und Begründung ethischer Normen," in K. Lorenz, ed., Konstruktionen versus Positionen: Festschrift für P. Lorenzen (Berlin: de Gruyter, 1976).
Karl Georg Faber, Theorie der Geschichtswis- senschaft (Munich: Beck, 1971), pp. 165 ff.
Gadamer, Wahrheit und Methode, pp. 290 ff.
"Das Apriori der Kommunikationsgemeinschaft und die Grundlagen der Ethik," in Apel, Transformation der Philosophie, 2: 358-436,
Habermas such as Jürgen Habermas, Legitimationsprobleme im Spätkapitalismus (Frankfurt: Suhrkamp, 1973),
Legitimation Crisis (Boston: Beacon Press, 1975),
Zur Rekonstruktion des historischen Materialismus (Frankfurt: Suhrkamp, 1976).
Karl R. Popper, Conjectures and Refutations (London: Routledge & Kegan Paul, 1963), pp. 34-35,
"Autobiography of Karl Popper," in P. A. Schilpp, ed., The Philosophy of Karl Popper, 2 vols. (La Salle: Library of Living Philosophers, 1974), 2: 32.
Ernest Nagel, "Methodological Issues in Psychoanalytic Theory," in Sidney Hook, ed., Psychoanalysis, Scientific Method, and Philosophy (New York: Grove, 1959), pp. 36-56,
Michael Scriven, "The Experimental Investigation of Psychoanalysis," ibid., pp. 226-251.
Wilhelm Dilthey, Der Aufbau der Geschichtlichen Welt in den Geisteswissenschaften, in his Gesammelte Schriften, 17 vols. (Stuttgart: Teubner, 1957-74), 7: 210 ff.
Paul Ricoeur, De L' interpretation: Essai sur Freud (Paris: Editions du Seuil, 1965).
Dilthey, Der Aufbau der Geschichtlichen Welt in den Geisteswissenschaften.
Habermas's account of psychoanalysis in his Erkenntnis und Interesse, pp. 10-11.
